Read EPUB file metadata

Source: R/epubr.R
epub_meta.Rd

Parse EPUB file metadata structure into a data frame. Assumptions are made, liberties taken, some fields may be dropped. You can always inspect the complete archive contents directly after using epub_unzip.

epub_meta(files, add_pattern = NULL)

Arguments

files

character vector of extracted files from EPUB file archive. See details.
add_pattern

supplemental regular expression pattern string to use for identifying chapters among all document sections. May be a function like, e.g. pat_startrek with additional filtering information for specific book titles.

Value

a data frame.

Details

This function is not typically called directly. If called directly, it must be done with files being a vector of the files created by the extraction performed by epub_unzip. Typically this function is called internally as part of epub_read, which combines the e-book metadata with the e-book text in a single data frame.

See also

epub_unzip, epub_read

Examples

# not run
